name: Parallel Paths (phd.phillip)
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME WILL INFURIATE YOU

- Grapple Hook Gameplay Goodness

- Collect Coins, Chalices, and Chests

- Use Collected Items To Purchase Upgrades like a Hover Pack!

- Swing Gameplay With A Swing Jazz Soundtrack & PACHINKO

- Different Dimensions to SPEEDRUN

- 3 Different Endings Based On What You Want Most

FIND YOUR DIMENSION BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT

You have been selected to participate in an experiment where you can make your wildest dream come true! You can be taken to a dimension where you are the most wealthy, the most powerful, or the most happy. The only catch is you can't stop once you've started - and you have to reach the end before the time runs out!

Once you reach your chosen dimension, do you really think it will be everything you've ever wanted?

(In testing I have found that people say it is a  "Getting over it" type game)
